phases.short_narrative: No malicious activity detected. Authentication and web traffic appear normal, and no security alerts were triggered.  The system is operating as expected. No further action is required at this time.

phases.short_narrative: The system has detected no unusual behavior. No malicious activity was identified across web traffic, authentication, or security alerts. The current state indicates a standard operational environment.
